item.title: Extract Brewing Methods
item.description: There may be almost as many ways to make beer as there are different styles of beer. While the basic formula is to combine a hoppy sugary liquid with yeast to ultimately produce a fermented beverage, the steps to get there can vary greatly. These different approaches also tend to affect brewing process, equipment and the ingredients that are required. Hopped Kits At the simplest end of the spectrum are pre-hopped extract kits.
